casebody.data:
KELLEY
v.
SHERIFF'S DEPT. No. 64P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 21, 2008. Ginny P. Lanier, Cary, Roger A. Askew, Scott W. Warren, Raleigh, for Sheriffs Dept. George W. Lennon, Raleigh, for Kelley.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of February 2008 by Defendant (Sheriffs Department) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of February 2008."
